summary: For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.
cast: Jon Foster|Samaire Armstrong|Frankie Muniz|Jimmi Simpson|Wendell Pierce|Milo Ventimiglia|Sophia Bush|Adam Goldberg|Billy Slaughter|Nicole Oppermann|April Wood|Monica Monica|Rio Hackford|Billy Louviere|J. Richey Nash|Maria Kalinina|Lauren Lorbeck|Veronica Mosgrove|Rick Green|James Haven|Alice Krige|Cynthia LeBlanc|Elton LeBlanc|Gary R. Percle Jr.
title: Stay Alive
